answers.answer: I'm craving Pho! I want soup all the time now and it's weird lol
Extra strong Trebor mints as always. It's becoming an obsession.

Everything lol I just see good food & want ittt!!!! I been craving a cookie icecream sandwich , But I'm going to eat quesadillas today with my Bf (: I crave alot of cheesburgers from anywhere lol ithink I want one right now!!
Waffles with strawberries and whipped cream. Made them for lunch and want them for dinner too

I'm getting ready to make some loaded mashed potatoes and will probably eat them all to myself unless my daughter wants a couple bites. That is all she's getting though. Lol!!! Jk!!! S u c k s having to share your food when you want to be a greedy piggy. Haha!!!
I'm craving pasta. So I'm making a rich white wine cream sauce with fresh thyme pan roasted capers blanched asparagus and smoked salmon:)
Pancakes and syrup, can't have though. Stupid gestational diabetes. I can't get enough pickles...
I just want stuff that sweet / salty
Crab legs! And crab meat and frozen hot chocolate from sheetz. And then home made Mac n cheese.
Mexican food! A chicken burrito with extra sour cream, guacamole and extra cheese. With beans and rice on the side! Mmmm

Reeses peanut butter cups (or pretty much any kind of chocolate lol) salads with sunflower seeds and ranch, cheesy food like Cheeseburgers and crave fries from checkers mmmm lol pretty much everything looks good to me!
I had cheese grits and steak wit eggs now bout to get a bowl of butter pecan ice cream and I don't like that ice cream flavor

question: I'm craving some lobster...I'm a big sea food lover... havnt had much seafood during my pregnancy but today I want some lobster with butter...yummmy! What are you ladies craving today?
title: What are you mommies craving today?
